Cult Killer is a 2024 American crime thriller film directed by Jon Keeyes and written by Charles Burnley, starring Alice Eve and Antonio Banderas.


Premise[edit]
In order to discover the killer of her mentor, a young investigator forms an alliance with a serial killer.[1]

Cast[edit]
Alice Eve as Cassie Holt
Antonio Banderas as Mikeal Tallini
Paul Reid as Rory McMahon
Shelley Hennig as Jamie Douglas
Production[edit]
Written by Charles Burnley, it is directed by Jon Keeyes. The film originally had the working title The Last Girl. The film is produced by Jordan Yale Levine, Jordan Beckerman, and Michael J. Rothstein for Yale, as well as Richard Bolger and Conor Barry from Hail Mary Pictures, and Richard Clabaugh.[2]

Casting[edit]
Alice Eve, Shelley Hennig and Antonio Banderas joined the cast in June 2022.[3]

Filming[edit]
Principal photography took place in Ireland and was completed in September 2022.[4]

Release[edit]
The film was released in the United States on January 19, 2024.[5]

Critical response[edit]
On the review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, 42% of 12 critics' reviews are positive, with an average rating of 5.50/10.[6]

^ "Cult Killer". Rotten Tomatoes. Retrieved February 6, 2024.
